name: Don't Mesh It !
description:
*** Don't MESH It, stay focused on what you read! ***

Don't MESH it ! is an amazing color Illusion game for everyone. Play with different colors. Let's see if your eyes can detect correct colors and color names at the same time. Ready for color FUN! Get ready, set go..

Don't MESH it ! is a color game Addictive in Nature for all ages,Specially designed with HD Graphics to make it more fun
You need to check if the name of the color written and press the appropriate color given in the box.

You think it's a breeze, huh?! Play with your friends and compare your scores!

- Try to be the best in all the 4 different challenges!
- Beat all your friends with best scores in all the different color challenges !

Remember: stay focused, there's always a trap!
